data.text: @UgandaRedCross @UNICEFUganda @MinofHealthUG @DrArnoldE @robert_kwesiga @inakasiita1 That is very good ,and there has been a huge  gap since most of the people took one doze and for the next doze people are not having that information. So it is good how i wish it would be conducted in all areas of Uganda.
@UgandaRedCross @robert_kwesiga @UNICEFUganda @MinofHealthUG @DrArnoldE @inakasiita1 Great work done... I pray that God blesses you beyond measure and expectations 🙏🙏
